result.eng: She slipped while she was going up the stairs.
result.ga: Sciorr sí agus í ag dul suas an staighre
result.orig: Sciorr sí agus í ag dul suas an staighre

result.ponchtml: Sciorr sí agus í ag dul suas an staiġreShe slipped while she was going up the stairs.

result.eng: We were sitting on the stairs.
result.ga: Bhí muid inár suí ar an staighre
